basics.name: Sinisa Mikulic
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: My name is Sinisa Mikulic and I come from Zagreb, Croatia. My experience as a Rails frontend developer has brought me to Berlin, where I started with more professional development as a frontend web developer, with main focus on responsive layouts (HTML/SCSS), JavaScript (ES6), React.js and Node.js frameworks, along with Ruby on Rails as a backend.

work.summary: Community of 30 million entertainment fans. A place for fans to talk about movies!
highlights: Maintaining user experience for moviepilot.com and it's authoring platform using Haml/Coffeescript/Ruby on Rails.
Managing and optimizing release of experimental Accelerated Mobile Pages for SEO and Facebook Instant Articles.

work.summary: Searchmetrics delivers enterprise SEO and content marketing analysis, recommendations, forecasting and reporting for companies that want potential customers to find them faster.
highlights: Developed user interface with React.js framework for MVP product by using Flux architecture and the latest JavaScript ES6.
Programmed RESTful web APIs in Node.js.
Wrote functional tests with Jest and Jasmine.

work.summary: Custom outfits put together by your personal style experts.
highlights: Implemented new features by using modular structure in JavaScript.
Ensured compatibility across browsers and devices.
Was responsible for maintenance and deployment of CMS.
Lead and mentored front­end team and reviewed code to ensure quality and reusability.

work.summary: A curated online community of shoppable personal closets.
highlights: Developed new features with responsive design for the startup application https://www.bibandtuck.com/ based on Ruby on Rails.
Optimized existing code written in Haml, SCSS and jQuery.

work.position: Rails/Front­end developer / UX designer / Product Owner
highlights: Developed and wireframed UX and user interface concepts.
Programmed layouts in Ruby on Rails and styled them in HTML and CSS.
Was responsible for cross browser and cross device testing.
Analysed use cases and SEO reports(GA and other tracking tools).

interests.name: Coding
keywords: https://goo.gl/g9Hqu1 - LinkBucket - Chrome plugin for saving your links for later
https://github.com/smikulic/stash - Budget Tracking built with React.js/Node.js/Mongodb/Gulp.js
